definition.text: The last layer manager is about the Trading System that features the trading rules for the simulation!

paragraphs.text: These layers work similar to those in the Trading Engine layer manager: they show information on the design space, not on the charts. The difference is that these show stuff on the trading system hierarchy!
These layers are particularly useful when designing, testing, and debugging strategies! Just wait and see!
Before continuing, turn some Simulation Objects layers off to avoid cluttering up the screen!
